name: MadWheels
description:
The game, currently in beta stage is being developed by Firefrog Studios, a small group of 5 students as our final project.

Controls

  • W: Go forward
  • S:  Go back.
  • A: Steer Left.
  • D: Steer Right.
  • Left Click: Shoot.
  • R: Respawn.
  • Esc: Pause game
  • 1:  CHEAT (Load level 1)
  • 2: CHEAT (Gives 10k of money to the player)
  • 3: CHEAT (Win level)
  • 4: CHEAT (Lose level)
Our Team Programmers:
  • Carlos Sierra
  • Franc Pujolar
Technical Artists:
  • Elena Sabaté
  • Joan Garcia
  • Raül Pla
